productInfo.primaryTitle: Wells Fargo Autograph Journey Visa® Credit Card Terms and Conditions
productInfo.secondaryTitle: Wells Fargo Autograph Journey Visa® Card Terms and Conditions
productInfo.description: Thank you for your interest in opening a Wells Fargo Autograph Journey Account.
productInfo.introBonusEligibility: You may not be eligible for introductory annual percentage rates, fees and/or rewards bonus offers if you have the Wells Fargo Autograph Journey Visa® or opened one within the last 48 months from the date of this application - even if that account is closed and has a $0 balance.

aprForPurchases.label: Annual Percentage Rate (APR) for Purchases
aprForPurchases.variableInfo: This APR will vary with the market based on the U.S. Prime Rate.

aprForBalanceTransfers.label: Annual Percentage Rate (APR) for Balance Transfers
aprForBalanceTransfers.basedOn: Based on your creditworthiness. Balance Transfers are subject to eligibility.
aprForBalanceTransfers.variableInfo: This APR will vary with the market based on the U.S. Prime Rate.

aprForCashAdvancesAndOverdraftProtection.label: APR for Cash Advances and Overdraft Protection Advances
aprForCashAdvancesAndOverdraftProtection.variableInfo: This APR will vary with the market based on the U.S. Prime Rate.

howToAvoidPayingInterestOnPurchases.label: How to Avoid Paying Interest on Purchases
howToAvoidPayingInterestOnPurchases.details: Your due date is at least 25 days after the close of each billing period. We will not charge you interest on purchases if you pay your entire balance by the due date each month.

minimumInterestCharge.label: Minimum Interest Charge
minimumInterestCharge.details: If you are charged interest, the charge will be no less than $1.00.

cfpbTips.label: For Credit Card Tips from the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau
cfpbTips.details: To learn more about factors to consider when applying for or using a credit card, visit the website of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau at https://www.consumerfinance.gov/learnmore.*

balanceTransfers.label: Balance Transfers
balanceTransfers.details: Introductory fee of either $5 or 3% of the amount of each balance transfer, whichever is greater, for 120 days from account opening. After that, up to 5% for each balance transfer, with a minimum of $5.

cashAdvances.label: Cash Advances
cashAdvances.details: Either $10 or 5% of the amount of each advance, whichever is greater.
